title.narrative: Social Safety Nets for Vulnerable Populations in the Province of Buenos Aires

description.narrative: Support the transition of the electricity ST scheme from the federal to the Buenos Aires provincial level, and the delivery of select social safety net programs targeting the vulnerable population in the PBA, as part of the COVID 19 emergency response

condition.narrative: Schedule 2. Section I.A Institutional Arrangements. The Borrower, through DPOMFB, shall: (a) operate and maintain throughoutProject implementation, a Project management team (“PMT”) with functions and responsibilities acceptable to the Bank.

Schedule 2. Section I.B Operational Manual. Without limitation to the provisions of Article V of the General Conditions, theBorrower, through DPOMFB, shall carry out the Project in accordance with an Operational Manual, satisfactory to the Bank.

Schedule 2. Section I.C Verification Agent for Scalable DLIs. The Borrower, through DPOMFB, shall appoint a verification agent forthe Scalable DLIs that is acceptable to the Bank, in accordance with the terms of reference acceptable to the Bank.

title.narrative: Institutional arrangements and regulations on ST administration approved by the provincial government

target.value: Integrated electricity users' database created, and standard reports based on the database published in a public official websiteof the PBA.

title.narrative: Number of distribution companies updating information on electricity users
Percentage of users with ST included by claims and ad hoc additional assessments mechanisms
Percentage of users with incomplete information in the database
Percentage of ST users included via social programs
Percentage of ST users with information on electricity consumption in the integrated database
Number of users with missing identification data
Number of users with missing socio-economic data
Consolidated grievance mechanism in place for the whole ST Program

target.value: The GM system is fully functional and uses the monitoring system to manage grievances
